Class Player

java.lang.Object
actors.GameActor

Class to represent the player that extends the abstract class GameActor

      public Player(Scanner inputScannerReference)
      constructor for the player object
      Parameters:
      inputScannerReference - - reference to scanner object

  • Method Details

    • bet

      public int bet()
      Public function that represents the player's ability to bet at the beginning of the game
      Returns:
      - integer representing the provided bet
      precondition
      Expects no input. Will interface with the player via the scanner
      postcondition
      Will return a positive integer less than the players current money total

    • reason

      public void reason()
      Reason function for player. The player interacts with the function via the user interface (the shared scanner object)
      Overrides:
      reason in class GameActor
      precondition
      Does not expect any input
      postcondition
      Will call either the hit or stand function based off of the player

    • getMoney

      public int getMoney()
      public getter function to return the player's money total
      Returns:
      - integer representing the player's current money total

    • setScannerReference

      public void setScannerReference(Scanner scannerReference)
      function to set the reference used by the player object to the scanner being used for the game
      Parameters:
      scannerReference - - reference to the scanner the player object will use to interact with the console
      precondition
      expects a reference to a Java Scanner object with System.in as the parameter
      postcondition
      sets the private scanner variable of the player class

    • addMoneyToPlayer

      public void addMoneyToPlayer(int money)
      function that adds any winnings to the players pool
      Parameters:
      money - - money earned from a hand
      precondition
      assumes the value is a positive integer value
      postcondition
      Adds the provided integer input to the players money holdings

    • drawTick

      public void drawTick()
      Implementation of the Visualizer interface for the Player object
      precondition
      Expects no input
      postcondition
      Returns no output
